title: So you can get a bug splat rejoin a game and still get leave buster?
body:
Start of the game, I get a bugsplat, after trying to reconnect the game forced me to repatch before I could rejoin into the game I was just doing. (Love when that happens) I rejoin and explain to my team "Hey my bad, bug splat" And they are cool with it they understand no one flaming, raging or anything other thing. We finish the game and even though we lost, I get hit with a leave buster. 

Now this is the same B.S. I've sent paper trails to riot support over and over that their leave buster is in fact flawed as hell. I got a leave buster just as we got to the status screen showing our results. So I know good damn well I didn't get reported that quick even IF my team were to all hit a report button on that. 

I've even show a picture (Best of the ability) up there. But I'm still going to be damned for the next 5 games?

replies.body: Leaverbusters happen when you're afk or disconnected for a long enough period to have it potentially affect the outcome of the match. There's a decent chance that had you been in the match the entire time, your team could have been the victors. You can always read up on how the system works on the [**leaverbuster faq**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714#h3q1).

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=i6XEKceY,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-09-26T02:44:10.109+0000)
>
> Leaverbusters happen when you're afk or disconnected for a long enough period to have it potentially affect the outcome of the match. There's a decent chance that had you been in the match the entire time, your team could have been the victors. You can always read up on how the system works on the [**leaverbuster faq**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714#h3q1).

I DID read the leavebuster faq and I saw one flaw about it. "IT'S NOT MY FAULT. MY INTERNET/**YOUR SERVERS DISCONNECTED ME**." Though you say the system keeps all of that in mind, it does NOT However take in consideration a bug splat. IF that was true, why would you guys allow lost prevention, if the leave buster suppose to "know" the difference ;/

The problem here is that the servers didn't actually disconnect you. A bugsplat comes from your own files not working properly which has something to do with your own pc. That part of the article is referring to when the servers do crash unexpectedly, in which case we can help out, but this didn't happen in your case.
